## Task 1: import data

```{r}
library("readr") 
library("sf")
library("ggplot2")
```


```{r}
#import csv
wildschwein_BE <- read_delim("data/wildschwein_BE_2056.csv", ",")

#convert to spatial object
wildschwein_BE <- st_as_sf(wildschwein_BE, coords = c("E", "N"), crs = 2056, remove = FALSE) #remove = False so the geometry column stays
```
